raw_comment: I will say that if you had asked anybody in Norway this question twenty years ago, close to a hundred percent would have said yeas, as that was a fact of life from 1890 and up till then.  Few think this is the case for the generations to come..
ace_sentences: The question was asked in Norway 20 years ago.
If the question was asked in Norway 20 years ago, almost 100 percent of people in Norway would have said yes.
From 1890 until that time, this was a fact of life in Norway.
Few people think that this will be the case for future generations.
